name: vcom2vcom
short_description: The code contains a virtual com driver which allows  applications communicating with serial devices to communicate with another application emulating the serial device. Compared to tty0tty it does not use the tty subsystem of the kernel but implements directly the typical ioctls which are required from upper SW layers
summary: Virtual COM driver kernel module  for Linux
